author: srcsm
description: PlaceholderAPI integration for Red. Use slash commands to query placeholder data.
install_msg:
Thank you for installing PAPI!

**Setup Instructions:**
1. Use `[p]papiset servername <name>` to set your server name
2. Use `[p]papiset footericon <url>` to set the footer icon
3. Install accompanying plugin on your server, configure and restart.
4. Enable slash commands with `[p]slash sync`

**Note:** This cog requires integration with your Minecraft server through an accompanying plugin, otherwise it will not work!
short: Use slash commands to query Minecraft PAPI placeholders.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores server configuration data (server name, footer icon URL, and debug settings). It does not store any personal user data.
